definition: a purposeful or industrious undertaking, especially one that requires effort or boldness
details:
noun
- a purposeful or industrious undertaking, especially one that requires effort or boldness
= example: a purposeful or industrious undertaking, especially one that requires effort or boldness
= synonyms: endeavor
- readiness to embark on bold new ventures
= synonyms: initiative, enterprisingness, go-ahead
- an organization created for business ventures
= example: an organization created for business ventures
